description: The oranges in this sweet and pungent salad will look like blood oranges after they sit for a little while with the beets This makes a pretty Christmas salad Try to find the wispy wild arugula, which is more pungent than regular arugula.
title: Beet, Orange and Arugula Salad
title_page: Beet, Orange and Arugula Salad Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
The oranges in this sweet and pungent salad will look like blood oranges after they sit for a little while with the beets. This makes a pretty Christmas salad. Try to find the wispy wild arugula, which is more pungent than regular arugula.
Featured in: Beet, Orange And Arugula Salad.
Learn: How to Make Salad
